sourcesContent:
<template>
	<full-calendar 
    :config="config"
    :events=EVENTS
    :selectable="true"
  

    />
    
</template>

<script>


  import { FullCalendar } from 'vue-full-calendar'
  import { mapGetters, mapMutations } from 'vuex'


	export default {
  components: {
    FullCalendar,
  },
  data() {
    var self =this;
    return {    
       
      config: {
        select: function(arg) {
          console.log(arg.end);
          self.addEvent(info);
        },
        defaultView: 'month'
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters(["EVENTS"])
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations([
      'ADD_EVENT'
    ]),
    addEvent: function(info){
      this.ADD_EVENT(
           {
            title: "Something",
            start: info.start,
            end: info.end,
            allDay:info.allDay
          })
    },
    handleSelect: function(arg) {
          console.log(arg);
          self.addEvent(arg);
        }
    
  }
  
  }


</script>
